Package camzup.pfriendly

Class TextEntity3

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Entity
camzup.core.Entity3
camzup.core.MeshEntity3
camzup.pfriendly.ImageEntity3
camzup.pfriendly.TextEntity3
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity, IOriented3, ISpatial3, IUtils, IVolume, IVolume3, java.lang.Iterable<Mesh3>
public class TextEntity3
extends ImageEntity3
A convenience to create billboards which present text strings as a single image texture. Useful for cases where unchanging text needs to be displayed on the screen.

    • TextEntity3

      public TextEntity3​(processing.core.PFont font, java.lang.String text, Color tint, int leading, int kerning, int alignHoriz, int alignVert, float scale)
      Creates a mesh entity from a billboard with a texture that displays text.
      Parameters:
      font - the Processing font
      text - the string of text
      tint - the color
      scale - the entity scale
      leading - spacing between lines
      kerning - spacing between characters
      alignHoriz - the horizontal alignment
      alignVert - the vertical alignment
      See Also:
